definition: Lancang River of Qinghai and Yunnan, the upper reaches of Mekong River 湄公河[Mei2 gong1 He2] of Southeast Asia
swelling water
blue-green or azure (of water)/vast (of water)/cold
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang

sentences.english: They decided to begin their trip from the beginning of the Lancang River.
sentences.chinese: 他们决定从澜沧江的源头开始旅行。

sentences.english: Than standing on the bank of the Lancang River.
sentences.chinese: 那你就在这澜沧江之上。

definition: Nujiang river of south Tibet and northwest Yunnan, the upper reaches of Salween river 薩爾溫江|萨尔温江, forming border of Myanmar and Thailand
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
Mekong River
Yalong river of Tibet and Sichuan

Three Parallel Rivers National Park, in mountainous northwest Yunnan World Heritage protected area: the three rivers are Nujian 怒江 or Salween, Jinsha 金沙江 or upper reaches of Changjiang and Lancang 澜沧江 or Mekong
Dulong river in northwest Yunnan on border with Myanmar, tributary of Salween or Nujiang 怒江, sometimes referred to as number four of Three parallel rivers 三江並流|三江并流, wildlife protection unit
Yarlung Tsangpo River, Tibet
the Grand Canyon of the Nujiang river in Tibet and Yunnan
Salween river, flowing from Tibet into Myanmar
Irrawaddy or Ayeyarwaddy River, the main river of Myanmar (Burma)
Jinsha river, upper reaches of Yangtze river or Changjiang 長江|长江 in Sichuan and Yunnan
Honghe county in Honghe Hani and Yi autonomous prefecture, Yunnan/Red River in China/Northern Vietnam
Gongshan Derung and Nu autonomous county in Nujiang Lisu autonomous prefecture 怒江傈僳族自治州[Nu4 jiang1 Li4 su4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1] in northwest Yunnan
Hengduan mountains, several parallel mountain ranges on the border between west Yunnan and Sichuan and east Tibet
Mt Haba (Nakhi: golden flower), in Lijiang 麗江|丽江, northwest Yunnan
Dangla or Tanggula mountain range on the Qinhai-Tibet plateau
